reference.title: cxxEnumerationDetail
reference.shortdesc: The <cxxEnumerationDetail> element provides detailed information about the structure and behaviors of the C++ enumeration.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxEnumerationDetail> element is defined within <cxxEnumeration>. In <cxxEnumerationDetail> the <example> and <section> elements are provided to support the current specific C++ API reference. A enumeration body can contain declarations of the members of the enumeration
